== ExtendedXmlPullParser ==

{{{
final XmlPullParserFactory factory = XmlPullParserFactory.newInstance();

final XmlPullParser parser_ = factory.newPullParser();

final ExtendedXmlPullParser parser = new ExtendedXmlPullParser(parser_);
assert (parser instanceof XmlPullParser);

// <tag1 date="1976-10-31T00-00-00.000+09:00">2076-10-31</tag1>
parser.nextTag();
final Date born = parser.getXSDateTimeAttribute("date");
final Date died = parser.nextXSDate();

// <tag2 id="1">1.5</tag2>
parser.nextTag();
final Integer id = parser.getIntAttribute("id");
final Double point = parser.nextDouble();

// <tag3/>
parser.nextTag();
final String tag3 = parser.nextNillableText();
assert tag3 == null;

// <tag4></tag4>
parser.nextTag();
final String tag4 = parser.nextNillableText();
assert tag4 != null;
assert tag4.equals("");
}}}
